meanings.sent1: I saved up all my gazoos to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: He worked hard to earn more gazoos for his family.
meanings.sent3: The kids were excited to find some gazoos hidden in their piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: Her gazoos were like magic beans, growing into something wonderful.
meanings.sent5: The shiny gazoos jingled in his pocket, a sign of his hard work.

meanings.definition: To make a buzzing or humming sound.
meanings.sent1: The bees gazoos around the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The old fridge would gazoos loudly at night.
meanings.sent3: The phone gazoos softly, signaling a new message.
meanings.sent4: The electric wires seemed to gazoos with energy.
meanings.sent5: The fan gazoos gently, creating a soothing background noise.

meanings.definition: A musical instrument resembling a kazoo.
meanings.sent1: The children played their gazoos in the school band.
meanings.sent2: She bought a colorful gazoo to join the music class.
meanings.sent3: The gazoos made funny sounds during the music lesson.
meanings.sent4: The gazoos in the orchestra added a unique touch to the performance.
meanings.sent5: His favorite gazoos had bright colors and funny shapes.
